00014 #ifndef ULIB_SIGNATURE_H
00015 #define ULIB_SIGNATURE_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/string.h>
00018 
00019 #include <openssl/evp.h>
00020 
00052 class U_EXPORT USignature {
00053 public:
00054 
00055         // Check for memory error
00056         U_MEMORY_TEST
00057 
00058         // = Allocator e Deallocator.
00059         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00060         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00061 
00069         static bool isSignatureAlgorithmSupported(const char* alg)
00070                 {
00071                 U_TRACE(0, "USignature::isSignatureAlgorithmSupported(%S)", alg)
00072 
00073                 bool result = (OBJ_txt2nid((char*)alg) != NID_undef); // No Such Algorithm
00074 
00075                 U_RETURN(result);
00076                 }
00077 
00078         static const EVP_MD* getEVP_MD(const char* alg)
00079                 {
00080                 U_TRACE(0, "USignature::getEVP_MD(%S)", alg)
00081 
00082                 U_ASSERT(isSignatureAlgorithmSupported(alg))
00083 
00084                 int nid           = OBJ_txt2nid((char*)alg);
00085                 const EVP_MD* evp = EVP_get_digestbynid(nid);
00086 
00087                 U_RETURN_POINTER(evp, const EVP_MD);
00088                 }
00089 
00094         USignature(const char* alg = "RSA-SHA1") : algorithm(alg)
00095                 {
00096                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, USignature, "%S", alg)
00097 
00098                 // OpenSSL_add_all_algorithms();
00099 
00100                 state          = UNINITIALIZED;
00101                 context.digest = getEVP_MD(alg);
00102                 }
00103 
00108         ~USignature()
00109                 {
00110                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, USignature)
00111                 }
00112 
00121         const char* getAlgorithm() const { return algorithm; }
00122 
00127         void resetEngine()
00128                 {
00129                 U_TRACE(1, "USignature::resetEngine()")
00130 
00131                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(EVP_DigestInit, "%p,%p", &context, context.digest);
00132                 }
00133 
00143         void initSign(EVP_PKEY* privKey)
00144                 {
00145                 U_TRACE(0, "USignature::initSign(%p)", privKey)
00146 
00147                 state      = SIGN;
00148                 privateKey = privKey;
00149 
00150                 resetEngine();
00151                 }
00152 
00161         void initVerify(EVP_PKEY* pubKey)
00162                 {
00163                 U_TRACE(0, "USignature::initVerify(%S)", pubKey)
00164 
00165                 state     = VERIFY;
00166                 publicKey = pubKey;
00167 
00168                 resetEngine();
00169                 }
00170 
00179         void update(const char* data, int offset = 0, int len = 0)
00180                 {
00181                 U_TRACE(1, "USignature::update(%.*S,%d,%d)", len, data, offset, len)
00182 
00183                 if (len == 0) len = strlen(data);
00184 
00185                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(EVP_DigestUpdate, "%p,%p,%d", &context, data + offset, len);
00186                 }
00187 
00195         void update(const UString& data) { update(data.data(), 0, data.size()); }
00196 
00204         UString sign();
00205         UString sign(const UString& data)                           { update(data);              return sign(); }
00206         UString sign(const char* data, int offset = 0, int len = 0) { update(data, offset, len); return sign(); }
00207 
00219         bool verify(const UString& signature)
00220                 {
00221                 U_TRACE(0, "USignature::verify(%.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(signature))
00222 
00223                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_EQUALS(state,VERIFY)
00224 
00225                 bool result = (EVP_VerifyFinal(&context, (unsigned char*)signature.data(), signature.size(), publicKey) == 1);
00226 
00227                 U_RETURN(result);
00228                 }
00229 
00230 #ifdef DEBUG
00231         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00232 #endif
00233 
00234 protected:
00235         EVP_MD_CTX context;
00236         const char* algorithm;
00237 
00238         EVP_PKEY* publicKey;  // used for verifying
00239         EVP_PKEY* privateKey; // used for signing
00240 
00241         enum State { UNINITIALIZED, SIGN, VERIFY } state;
00242 
00243 private:
00244         USignature(const USignature&)            {}
00245         USignature& operator=(const USignature&) { return *this; }
00246 };
